meanings.definition: A compound containing the chromyl group, CrO2.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different chromyls in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Chromyls are important compounds used in various chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student accidentally spilled chromyls all over the classroom.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a jar full of colorful chromyls, bright and fascinating.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the chromyls sparkled like tiny gems.

meanings.sent1: The chemist explained the properties of the chromyls in detail.
meanings.sent2: When studying ions, one must consider the behavior of chromyls.
meanings.sent3: The chromyls at the party were positively charged with energy.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement bubbled up inside her like a solution of chromyls.
meanings.sent5: The chromyls danced in the test tube, creating a mesmerizing display.

meanings.definition: Compounds containing the chromyl group, CrO2.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician handled the chromyls with care.
meanings.sent2: Chromyls can exhibit unique chemical properties.
meanings.sent3: The chromyls in the experiment turned the solution a vibrant yellow.
meanings.sent4: His words were like chromyls, leaving a lasting impression on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The chromyls reacted explosively when mixed with the other chemicals.
